channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6847] Improve / fix bugs in Hive scratch dir setup
item.description: Currently, the hive server creates scratch directory and changes permission to 777 however, this is not great with respect to security. We need to create user specific scratch directories instead. Also refer to HIVE-6782 1st iteration of the patch for approach.
item.summary: Improve / fix bugs in Hive scratch dir setup

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This seems like a nice addition, but wondering do we need to escape special characters in generating user-scratch dir, like the logic we use in generating the partition names (FileUtils.escapePathName)? Also there is some extra formatting diffs, and it'd be clearer to see it in the review board if you could
Thanks for taking a look szehon. The review board link is already shared in the link section.
vgumashta Thanks,somehow the review board wasnt there when I made the comment, sorry about that. Left some comments.

Posting test-result manually

ATTACHMENT ID: 12666429
Just ran both the failed tests locally. None of the TestMinimrCliDriver qtests fail and neither does TestCompactionTxnHandler.
Patch committed to trunk! Thanks thejas, szehon, vkorukanti and jdere for reviews.

Doc note: This changes the default value and description for hive.exec.scratchdir, which is already documented in the wiki (in Configuring Hive as well as Configuration Properties). It also gives a description for hive.scratch.dir.permission, which is not documented in the wiki yet. No change is made to hive.downloaded.resources.dir, it's just removed in one place and added elsewhere.

Here are all the places in the wiki that hive.exec.scratchdir is documented:

  • AdminManual Configuration – Configuring Hive
  • AdminManual Configuration – Temporary Folders
  • AdminManual Configuration – Configuration Variables
  • Configuration Properties – hive.exec.scratchdir
  • example of using hive.exec.scratchdir (2nd bullet): Hive CLI – Examples
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
